citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:21pm on June
14, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by phone. Upon arrival, the licensee was contacted
by phone, stating they were out of town. No one would be available for an inspection on today.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:21pm on June 
14, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by phone. Upon arrival, the licensee was contacted 
by phone, stating they were out of town. No one would be available for an inspection on today.  
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
